text.en: How are you feeling right now? Are you feeling good, or not okay?
text.tl: Kumusta ang pakiramdam mo ngayon? Masaya ka ba, o hindi okay?

text.en: I’m glad to hear that. What helped you feel better? Do you want to talk about it, or would you like to talk about food?
text.tl: Masaya akong marinig yan. Ano ang nakapagpagaan ng pakiramdam mo? Gusto mo bang magkwento, o pagkain ang pag-usapan natin?

text.en: That sounds heavy. What would help you right now? Do you want to talk about it, or think about food for a bit?
text.tl: Mukhang mabigat yan. Ano ang makakatulong sa’yo ngayon? Gusto mo bang magkwento, o pagkain muna ang isipin natin?

text.en: I’m listening. How do you feel now? Do you feel better, or does it still feel heavy?
text.tl: Nakikinig ako. Kumusta na ang pakiramdam mo ngayon? Medyo magaan na ba, o mabigat pa rin?

text.en: Are you actually hungry, or just craving something?
text.tl: Talagang gutom ka ba, o may cravings ka lang?

text.en: What are you thinking of eating? Breakfast, or lunch or dinner?
text.tl: Anong meal ang naiisip mo? Almusal, o tanghalian o hapunan?

text.en: What are you craving right now? Something sweet, or something salty?
text.tl: Ano ang hinahanap ng panlasa mo ngayon? Matamis, o maalat?

text.en: That sounds nice. Do you want to eat now, or would you like to keep chatting?
text.tl: Mukhang masarap yan. Kakain ka na ba, o kwento muna tayo?

text.en: Enjoy your food. When you’re ready, do you want to check in again, or rest for now?
text.tl: Sige, kain ka muna. Kapag ready ka na, gusto mo bang kumusta ulit, o magpahinga muna?
